{"step_by_step_thinking": "The mediastinum is the area between the lungs. The tumors that occur in this area are called mediastinal tumors. Neurogenic tumors are common in the posterior mediastinum, but not the most common overall. Bronchogenic cysts are also not the most common. Thymomas are common, but lymphomas are the most common mediastinal tumors.", "answer_choice": "C. Lymphoma"}
